thread.title: Norbert Giltner
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Norbert Giltner

author: Norbert Giltner
title: Norbert Giltner
text: Have had 2 home claims and 2 auto claims All were handled with the greatest of ease in timely manner. I tried to stall hail damage to roof claim until after hail storm season was over and had claims adjusters calling me to get going. FIrst time I'd ever been prodded by insurance company spend their money.
